name: Dicing Through
description:
Welcome to Dicing Through! This is a game where you play as a cannon-ball operator, with your objective being to eliminate all the blue cubes in each level. 

To start, use WASD for rotating the cannon. Once it is positioned the way you want it, hold space to build up momentum and fire. You will be catapulted as a dice onto whichever cube it is you aimed at. 

Refer to Image 1. 

Now, upon every impact, you can use some of your energy points to change the direction the dice is headed. Energy points are earned depending on which side of the dice is facing upwards when hitting the cubes. Use WASD to move the crosshair into position on the holographic blue sphere, and upon pressing space, notice your dice moves in the direction your crosshair was aiming at! 

Refer to Image 2. 

Please feel free to share your high score (levels) in the comments. Mine is 4!
